title: How to Catch Thundurus in Pokémon White

steps.title: You may find a Pokémon with a helpful move or ability.
steps.content: You may find a Pokémon with a helpful move or ability. A move like Mean Look or an ability like Shadow Tag keeps it from escaping right when the battle starts.

steps.title: Buy a couple Quick Balls and some regular Poké Balls.
steps.content: Buy a couple Quick Balls and some regular Poké Balls. You may need a lot of Ultra Balls and Timer Balls. Make sure you obtained a Quick Ball, because that's what you will be throwing at Thundurus.

steps.title: See where there is an "unusual" thunderstorm.
steps.content: See where there is an "unusual" thunderstorm. Go to that route.

steps.title: The regular Pokémon music won't pop up.
steps.content: The regular Pokémon music won't pop up. It'll be different and the graphics are different too. It should be raining hard and expect lightning and thunderbolts.

steps.title: Use Mean Look or Shadow Tag (or something similar).
steps.content: Use Mean Look or Shadow Tag (or something similar). Otherwise, it will bounce all over Unova, making it hard to keep up with and track down.

steps.title: Don't bother attacking unless you have a good move.
steps.content: Don't bother attacking unless you have a good move. Moves like Thunder Wave (Blitzle or Zebstrika) or Hypnosis (Musharna) work well. Avoid a burn, however (Will-O-Wisp). If your Pokémon doesn't have that move or Mean Look, just throw a Quick Ball at it.
